== Wiki ==

=== Content Managers ===

These members are in charge of ensuring all content on the Wiki is correctly formatted. This includes grammar, spelling, punctuation, style, flow, etc. These members should not be creating or significantly modifying Meeting Notes, Road Maps, or FAQ's.

=== Meeting Notes ===

These members are in charge of taking and compiling meeting notes in a neat and orderly fashion.

=== Road Maps ===

These members are in charge of managing road maps. This means that they add/edit/delete road maps as well as checking with assigned member to ensure they are working toward this goal.

=== FAQ ===

These members are in charge of managing what is on the FAQ page. They should be consulted for all changes to these pages.
